# idsec_identity_role (Data Source)

The Identity service role data source. It reads the role information and metadata and is based on the ID of the role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_identity_role" "myrole" {
  role_name = "MyRole"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `role_name` (String) Role name to find the id for

### Optional

- `admin_rights` (List of String) Admin rights assigned to the role
- `description` (String) Description of the role
- `role_id` (String) Role ID found by name
